title: Isil leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi reportedly killed in US forces raid
text:
Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the leader of the Islamic State, is reported to have died following a US military raid in north-west Syria.

Baghdadi, whose real name is Ibrahim Awwad Ibrahim Ali Muhammad al-Badri al-Samarrai, is thought to have killed himself with a suicide vest as US special operations forces descended, according to media citing multiple government sources.

He was with two wives, who are also reported to have been killed by the blast, and children which are believed to still be alive.

The raid, which began after midnight, targeted a compound Baghdadi and his family were thought to have been staying in Barisha village in Idlib province near the Turkish border.

In a video which is thought to have captured the raid helicopters and heavy clashes can be heard.
description: Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the leader of the Islamic State, is reported to have died following a US military raid in north-west Syria.
